headline: Is Quanta Services (PWR) Priced Fairly After Recent Pullback And Infrastructure Contract Momentum
summary: If you are wondering whether Quanta Services at around US$422 a share offers fair value or stretched expectations, you are not alone. The stock has seen a 3.9% decline over the last week and an 8.6% decline over the last month, although the 1 year return sits at 35% and the 3 year return is up 185.8% with a very large 5 year gain of 459.8%. Recent news around Quanta Services has focused on its role as a major contractor in power, energy and infrastructure projects, as investors watch how...
